description: The inspector general for the Department of Health and Human Services describes a dire situation for front-line doctors and medical staff as coronavirus cases mount in hospitals. Read the full report.
title: READ: Watchdog report on hospitals' coronavirus response
title_page: READ: Watchdog report on hospitals' coronavirus response - CNNPolitics
maintext: Washington (CNN) The inspector general for the Department of Health and Human Services describes a dire situation for front-line doctors and medical staff as coronavirus cases mount in hospitals. Read the full report.
